title: Unboxing the new HP EliteBook 840 G8 Aero
author: sponsored
summary: Getting hands on with the world's lightest 14” business laptop
article: The HP EliteBook 840 G8 Aero builds on the success of the EliteBook 800 Series with a light-weight chassis, enhanced security, connectivity and collaboration features. Here’s Tefty with first hand impressions on the EliteBook 840 G8.

Coming in at just under 2.5lbs, this is the world’s lightest 14” mainstream business laptop. The design features a new magnesium chassis that contains 90% recycled materials, recycled plastics, and 100% sustainably sourced packaging to reduce environmental impact.
For more information on pricing and availability visit HP.com
